metadata.description: Resource Group deployment region
Indicate if Hub-Spoke Network should be deployed.
Indicate if a Linux and Windows Jumpbox should be deployed.
Indicate if a VPN Gateway should be deployed. Note: deployment may take up to 45 min addtional time. Certificate has to be added after creation.
Indicate if Azure Batch Demo should be deployed.
Indicate if the NxOv Demo should be deployed.
Get the Batch Service Object Id: az ad sp show --id "MicrosoftAzureBatch" --query objectId -o tsv
Select true if Batch Service has not been gratned contributor permissions.
Private access (Recommended) is only available for Premium SKU.

properties.description: Denies the ability to remote desktop onto Azure batch nodes
Denies the ability to ssh onto Azure batch nodes

variables.linuxVmInitScriptRaw:
#!/bin/sh

echo "Script triggered by cloud-init process"


# Install required packages and ensure installed packages are updated

apt update
apt upgrade -y
apt install  azure-cli nfs-common jq -y

# Mount the NFS File Share

mkdir -p /mnt/share

mount -o sec=sys,vers=3,nolock,proto=tcp {0}.blob.core.windows.net:/{0}/{1}  /mnt/share

metadata.description: Required. Name of the Application Insights
Optional. Application type

Required. Resource ID of the log analytics workspace which the data will be ingested to. This property is required to create an application with this API version. Applications from older versions will not have this property.
Optional. The network access type for accessing Application Insights ingestion. - Enabled or Disabled
Optional. The network access type for accessing Application Insights query. - Enabled or Disabled

Optional. The kind of application that this component refers to, used to customize UI. This value is a freeform string, values should typically be one of the following: web, ios, other, store, java, phone.
Optional. Location for all Resources

Optional. Array of role assignment objects that contain the 'roleDefinitionIdOrName' and 'principalId' to define RBAC role assignments on this resource. In the roleDefinitionIdOrName attribute, you can provide either the display name of the role definition, or it's fully qualified ID in the following format: '/providers/Microsoft.Authorization/roleDefinitions/c2f4ef07-c644-48eb-af81-4b1b4947fb11'.
Optional. Tags of the resource.
Optional. Customer Usage Attribution ID (GUID). This GUID must be previously registered
The name of the application insights component
The resource ID of the application insights component
The resource group the application insights component was deployed into

metadata.description: Required. Specifies the Virtual Network Gateway name.
Optional. Location for all resources.
Optional. Specifies the name of the Public IP used by the Virtual Network Gateway. If it's not provided, a '-pip' suffix will be appended to the gateway's name.
Optional. Resource ID of the Public IP Prefix object. This is only needed if you want your Public IPs created in a PIP Prefix.
Optional. Specifies the zones of the Public IP address. Basic IP SKU does not support Availability Zones.

Optional. DNS name(s) of the Public IP resource(s). If you enabled active-active configuration, you need to provide 2 DNS names, if you want to use this feature. A region specific suffix will be appended to it, e.g.: your-DNS-name.westeurope.cloudapp.azure.com
Required. Specifies the gateway type. E.g. VPN, ExpressRoute
Required. The Sku of the Gateway.
Required. Specifies the VPN type
Required. Virtual Network resource ID
Optional. Value to specify if the Gateway should be deployed in active-active or active-passive configuration
Optional. Value to specify if BGP is enabled or not
Optional. ASN value
Optional. The IP address range from which VPN clients will receive an IP address when connected. Range specified must not overlap with on-premise network.
Optional. Client root certificate data used to authenticate VPN clients.
Optional. Thumbprint of the revoked certificate. This would revoke VPN client certificates matching this thumbprint from connecting to the VNet.
Optional. Specifies the number of days that logs will be kept for; a value of 0 will retain data indefinitely.
Optional. Resource ID of the diagnostic storage account.
Optional. Resource ID of log analytics.
Optional. Resource ID of the event hub authorization rule for the Event Hubs namespace in which the event hub should be created or streamed to.
Optional. Name of the event hub within the namespace to which logs are streamed. Without this, an event hub is created for each log category.

Optional. Array of role assignment objects that contain the 'roleDefinitionIdOrName' and 'principalId' to define RBAC role assignments on this resource. In the roleDefinitionIdOrName attribute, you can provide either the display name of the role definition, or its fully qualified ID in the following format: '/providers/Microsoft.Authorization/roleDefinitions/c2f4ef07-c644-48eb-af81-4b1b4947fb11'
Optional. Specify the type of lock.
Optional. Tags of the resource.
Optional. Customer Usage Attribution ID (GUID). This GUID must be previously registered
Optional. The name of logs that will be streamed.
Optional. The name of logs that will be streamed.
Optional. The name of metrics that will be streamed.

startTask.commandLine: cmd /c @"%SystemRoot%\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe" -NoProfile -InputFormat None -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "iex ((New-Object System.Net.WebClient).DownloadString('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Azure/batch-insights/master/scripts/run-windows.ps1'))" & python-3.10.1-amd64.exe /quiet InstallAllUsers=1 PrependPath=1 Include_test=0
